summary: Base context class for . This includes an assumption that a test means invoking a method on a class.

content.value: public class TestRunnerContext<TTest> : TestRunnerBaseContext<TTest>, IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable where TTest : class, ITest
Public Class TestRunnerContext(Of TTest As {Class, ITest}) Inherits TestRunnerBaseContext(Of TTest) Implements IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable

inheritedMembers.summary: Gets the aggregator used for reporting exceptions.
Gets the cancellation token source used for cancelling test execution.
Gets a flag which indicates how explicit tests should be handled.
Gets the message bus to send execution engine messages to.
Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources asynchronously.
Called immediately after the class has been created, before it is used.
